replies.body: You call people "bronzies," announce that you've given up, and spam the chat with nonsense. The reform card just shows you examples of the inappropriate chat that you need to fix; it's not an exhaustive list of every match in which you were reported. When a mild punishment like a chat restriction proves ineffective, the system ramps it up, which is why you can receive a 14-day suspension for behaving like this. If you return after your suspension and continue behaving like this, your next punishment will be a permaban.
It looks like he edited out some of the stuff he said, Because I doubt he got a 2 week susp for this, their has to be more that he deleted.
Can you take screen shots of the in game client?

I'm guessing is 14 days because you decided to sell all your items... twice.
Next time don't make it so easy for the system to pick up.

Did you leave that game early? Do you have a history of doing that?

Correction: you seemed to have sold all of your AD items for AP items. But still.

Did you have previous chat restrictions? If not, file a support ticket and ask them why it was escalated.

If you did, just for your information, the punishments work on a tiered system. You get a 10 game CR, 25 game CR, and then a 14 day ban, then a permaban. Certain things can escalate a punishment up the tiers, but I dont see anything worthy of that, so I'm assuming you've had previous punishments.
I haven't been chat restricted at all

> [{quoted}](name=ARGthe1st,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2FksqAgf,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-09-26T23:56:39.025+0000)
>
> I haven't been chat restricted at all

Then yeah, file a support ticket. Idk how long you AFKed for, so that could have something to do with it, as gameplay offenses are punished more harshly than verbal offenses. But if they told you it was for your chat, then the afk would have nothing to do with it. Definitely talk to support. Its possible to get it reduced.
I mean I thought that for a 14 day suspension you had to type "kys" or like racial slurs in 3 different games?

Nope. If you had a 10 game chat restriction and a 25 game chat restriction, then this is the next step. And the step after this? Permaban. Just so you are aware, after the 14 days are over, any negativity will result in a permaban.
But Ive never had a chat restriction

Then reach out to riot support/make a ticket.
If it was made in error they’ll reverse it. If it it’ll remain and they’ll have the entire picture.

Where did you get this chat log?  This doesn't look like the format that's in the reform card.  Those don't have [All] indication, they do not say "Pre Game Lobby:".  They say "Pre-Game".  "In Game" should be "In-Game".  "Post Game Lobby:" should be "Post-Game".
